original_title: Escape to Nature: Vol. 3: Mighty Water Falls
overview: Capturing the awesome power of moving water, this third installment of the Escape to Nature series harnesses the energy of natural elements to help you achieve a sense of inner calm and forget the stresses of the outside world. Designed to inspire meditation and relaxation, the program presents a series of inspiring images and set them against a backing soundtrack of soothing ambient music.
title: Escape to Nature: Vol. 3: Mighty Water Falls
